Text: Off Special OfferTHE CORPORATE VENTURING SUMMIT Optimizing Value and Managing Risk in your Corporate Venturing Endeavors October American Video Center New York NY MEDIA PARTNERS The Deal Upside vFinance Association for Corporate Growth Private Equity Online MergerStat Being this your last chance to register we are currently offering a discount off the registration fee This is your last opportunity to attend this unique forum that addresses the needs of todays strategic corporate investor this exclusive event is your chance to learn from industry leaders how they are adapting their corporate venturing practices to extract value from todays marketplace To take advantage of this special offer mention keycode WBE when booking your place CLICK HERE TO VISIT OUR WEBSITE FOR FULL PROGRAM AND REGISTRATION INFORMATION For more information or to register Call Cyrus Johnson tollfree on ext or email mailto To be removed from this mailing list please email mailto and write Remove WB in the subject line
